Title: Microsoft Copilot
Description: AI-powered assistant integrated with Microsoft 365 apps like Word, Excel, etc., to enhance productivity by drafting content, providing insights, and handling tasks.

Title: Power Automate
Description: Full capabilities including cloud flows, attended desktop flows, and process mining, used to automate complex business processes

Title: Power BI
Description: Create rich, interactive reports with Power BI Desktop, used for basic data visualization and reporting.Enterprise-scale features for data professionals, used for advanced analytics and large-scale data processing.
